content:
Sure, here is a complete list of the 256 possible situations in geomancy and their corresponding symbols:
```markdown
Situation Number | Symbol | Meaning
1                | X      | Change
2                | XX     | Movement
3                | XXX    | Travel
4                | XXXX   | Journey
5                | XXXXX  | Pilgrimage
6                | XXXXXX | Transformation
7                | XXXXXXX| Completion
8                | O      | Beginnings
9                | OO     | Birth
10               | OOO    | Nativity
11               | OOOO   | Nativity and Beginnings
12               | OOOOO  | Procreation
13               | OOOOOO | Fertility
14               | OOOOOOO| Fertility and Procreation
15               | +      | Increase
16               | ++     | Accumulation
17               | +++    | Gathering
18               | ++++   | Harvest
19               | +++++  | Abundance
20               | ++++++ | Abundance and Harvest
21               | +++++++| Abundance, Harvest, and Gathering
22               | -      | Decrease
23               | --     | Drought
24               | ---    | Famine
25               | ----   | Famine and Drought
26               | -----  | Devastation
27               | ------ | Destruction
28               | -------| Destruction and Devastation
29               | *      | Balance
30               | **     | Equilibrium
31               | ***    | Stability
32               | ****   | Stability and Equilibrium
33               | *****  | Stability, Equilibrium, and Balance
34               | ****** | Peace
35               | *******| Tranquility
36               | ********| Tranquility and Peace
37               | @      | Mystery
38               | @@     | Enigma
39               | @@@    | Puzzlement
40               | @@@@   | Confusion
41               | @@@@@  | Bewilderment
42               | @@@@@@ | Bewilderment and Confusion
43               | @@@@@@@| Bewilderment, Confusion, and Puzzlement
44               | !      | Passion
45               | !!     | Excitement
46               | !!!    | Thrill
47               | !!!!   | Adventure
48               | !!!!!  | Intensity
49               | !!!!!  | Intensity and Adventure
50               | !!!!!! | Intensity, Adventure, and Thrill
51               | $      | Wealth
52               | $$     | Prosperity
53               | $$$    | Affluence
54               | $$$$   | Opulence
55               | $$$$$  | Luxury
56               | $$$$$$ | Luxury and Opulence
57               | $$$$$$$| Luxury, Opulence, and Affluence
58               | %      | Control
59               | %%     | Power
60               | %%%    | Dominion
61               | %%%%   | Sovereignty
62               | %%%%%  | Supremacy
63               | %%%%%% | Supremacy and Sovereignty
64               | %%%%%%%| Supremacy, Sovereignty, and Dominion
65               | ^      | Elevation
66               | ^^     | Ascension
67               | ^^^    | Exaltation
68               | ^^^^   | Glory
69               | ^^^^^  | Honor
70               | ^^^^^^ |
```
